alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 19 at 1:54AM PDT until March 22 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. For Esmeralda and central Nye Counties, total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. For Lincoln County, total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Locally up to 16 inches on higher peaks. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. * WHEN...From early Tuesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy snow accumulations could cause tree or power pole damage, resulting in power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
